name: Egghead 4: Egghead Entertains
overview: In this fourth adventure in the Egghead series of platform games, the hero is cooking a meal for his girlfriend, Shelley. To do so, he must travel through 52 different screens to collect the right ingredients. Scattered along the way there will also be items to help him.
developers: Chris Dewhurst, Jonathan Cauldwell & Kees Van Oss
